esg.saml.authz.service.api
Interface SAMLAuthorizationServiceClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
SAMLAuthorizationServiceClientSoapImpl
public interface SAMLAuthorizationServiceClient

Client-side API for interacting with a SAMLAuthorizationService. Note that this API is binding-agnostic.

Method Summary
 String buildAuthorizationRequest(String openid, String resource, String action)
          Method to build a serialized SAML authorization request for a user with given OpenID, a given resource, and a given action.
 SAMLAuthorizations parseAuthorizationResponse(String authorizationResponse)
          Method to parse a serialized SAML authorization response into a user object.
 

Method Detail

buildAuthorizationRequest

String buildAuthorizationRequest(String openid,
                                 String resource,
                                 String action)
                                 throws org.opensaml.xml.io.MarshallingException
Method to build a serialized SAML authorization request for a user with given OpenID, a given resource, and a given action.

Parameters:
openid - : the user unique identifier.
resource - : the resource requested.
action - : the operation to be performed on the resource.
Returns:
the SAML authorization request (with binding) serialized as string, to be sent to the SAML attribute service.
Throws:
org.opensaml.xml.io.MarshallingException

parseAuthorizationResponse

SAMLAuthorizations parseAuthorizationResponse(String authorizationResponse)
                                              throws org.opensaml.xml.parse.XMLParserException,
                                                     org.opensaml.xml.io.UnmarshallingException
Method to parse a serialized SAML authorization response into a user object.

Parameters:
authorizationResponse - : the SAML authorization response obtained from the SAML service, serialized as string.
Returns:
: object populated with authorizations extracted from the SAML response.
Throws:
org.opensaml.xml.parse.XMLParserException
org.opensaml.xml.io.UnmarshallingException
